timeline.bodyText:
Does this test need to be so long? This will slow everyone down. Can you increase the publish interval for testing like we've done for deployment polling?
By decreasing the deployment polling from 15 seconds to 1 second our e2e tests cut in more than half from over 20 minutes to around 12.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.message: Don't sleep for a long time. Add logic to see the MQTT message sent.
